text: The flag of San Diego was a tricolor of red, white, and yellow with a coat of arms charged in the center of the white stripe. While the meaning of the colors has changed over time, these three colors were adopted by flag of Spain. The ratio of the flag is 4:7. ==Related pages== * Flags of cities of the United States * San Diego * Flag of California ==References== San Diego Category:Flags with coats of arms Category:San Diego
title: Flag of San Diego
